feed.title: Open Block Chain Licence, BIP[xxxx] Draft

entry.title: Open Block Chain Licence, BIP[xxxx] Draft
entry.summary: On September 1st, 2015 at 1:30 PM, Ahmed Zsales via bitcoin-dev sent a message regarding a draft Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP) for discussion and evaluation. The details of the draft BIP can be found at the provided link, which leads to a Google Drive document. Luke added that BIPs should be in MediaWiki-compatible markdown format rather than PDF.
